text: Vagabond Heart is the sixteen studio album by Rod Stewart was released on 26 March, 1991. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in the United States and topped the charts in Australia. ==Track listing== Notes * signifies a co-producer *"Downtown Train" and "This Old Heart of Mine (Is Weak For You) are omitted on cassette copies, as well as some CD versions. ==References== Category:1991 albums Category:Rod Stewart albums
title: Vagabond Heart
